Drove in 7 runs against Toronto on 7/15/1985...
2/2/1987: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,450,000 through salary arbitration...
2/2/1988: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,142,857 through salary arbitration...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/24/1988, hitting .417 with 3 HR, 7 RBI...
Drove in 7 runs against Texas on 8/30/1988...
2/2/1989: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,142,857 through salary arbitration...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/22/1989, hitting .429 with 4 HR, 10 RBI...
Signed as a free agent by Toronto on 2/10/1990 to a 3-year deal worth $3,800,000 per year...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against New York (Y) on 5/27/1990...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/29/1990, hitting .632 with 1 HR, 6 RBI...
Injured on 5/19/1991 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Traded from Toronto to Los Angeles on 5/18/1992 (Going to LAD: 2B Amaury Garcia, SS Lou Collier, 3B Mike Pagliarulo, P Heath Haynes. Going to TOR: 1B Fred McGriff, CF Chili Davis)...
